Name: Montecristo Supremos 2019 Limited Edition
Short description: Habanos Limited Editions are highly appreciated and anticipated by cigar enthusiasts every year, and even more so when this is a new vitola from one of the world’s benchmark Habano brands. Montecristo Supremos, with a 55 x 130 mm, is the Montecristo with the heaviest ring gauge launched to date.
Description:
Montecristo Supremos 2019 Limited Edition

  • Size: 5 1/8 x 55
  • Strength: Medium to Full-Bodied
This release will be presented in a special case designed with the brand’s characteristic colours including 25 Habanos made “ Totalmente a Mano con Tripa Larga ” -Totally Handmande with Long Filler, following a careful selection of the wrapper, filler and binder leaves from the Vuelta Abajo* region, considered to be the best land in the world for growing tobacco. Habanos Limited Editions are highly appreciated and anticipated by cigar enthusiasts every year, and even more so when this is a new vitola from one of the world’s benchmark Habano brands. Montecristo Supremos, with a 55 x 130 mm, is the Montecristo with the heaviest ring gauge launched to date. The Montecristo brand owes its name to the novel “The Count of Montecristo” by Alexandre Dumas. This is one of the most renowned and appreciated Habanos brands worldwide. This benchmark for Habanos flavour was first introduced in the Cuban magazine “Habano” in 1935. Thanks to its distinguished aroma and its “Long Filler” vitolas made totally handmade with leaves from the Vuelta Abajo* region, this Habano has captivated the most experienced smokers. Montecristo progressively began completing its portfolio, originally made up of only five vitolas, gradually filling out an offer that currently covers the taste of the most demanding smokers. Today, the brand has vitolas ranging from the majestic Montecristo A, to other smaller formats such as the Montecristo Joyitas.

Name: Trinidad Media Luna Cuban Cigars
Short description: The Vigia is the first new product to the Trinidad line in several years. It is the largest ring gauge ever to be featured in the line.
Description:
Trinidad Media Luna Cuban Cigars

  • Size: 4 1/2 x 50
  • Strength: Medium
Trinidad Media Luna cigars are renowned for their exceptional taste. The tobacco used in these cigars has been fermented and aged for several years, which gives it a depth and complexity of flavor that is sought after. These cigars are rolled by hand with meticulous care and attention to detail, resulting in a flawless appearance and smooth draw in every cigar.

About Trinidad Cigars

Trinidad, as a Habanos brand, dates back to 1969 but for many years, like Cohiba, it was made only for gifts to foreign diplomats. Not until 1998 was it released for general sale.  For several years Trinidad was made at El Laguito, the Cohiba factory,  where its uniquely fragrant and aromatic, medium flavoured blend of filler and binder leaves from the Vuelta Abajo zone was developed.  Made using the Tripa Larga, Totalmente a Mano - long filler, totally by hand - technique.

Name: Crowned Heads La Imperiosa Magicos
Description:
Crowned Heads La Imperiosa Magicos

  • Size: 4 1/2 x 52
  • Strength: Full
Originally a Cuban brand from the early 1900’s, La Imperiosa translates to ‘the imperative,’ or, “..that which is absolutely necessary or required.” The La Imperiosa artwork and band were inspired by the original Cuban vista and band of years gone by. TASTING NOTES: Opens big with a burst of red pepper, before easing off the throttle and settling onto the palate with dense and multi-layered notes of dark fruit, earth, and charred meat. The flavor is at once dense and approachable, with a massively-brooding muscular structure.

About Crowned Heads Cigars

Crowned Heads is a premium cigar company committed to producing cigars of artisanal quality that are defined by a combination of excellent flavor, balance, and consistency. We believe in continuous improvement, and in a marriage of tradition with innovation.  We feel that tobacco lives, breathes, and speaks to us; it leads the blend and it names the brand.  As Michelangelo once said, “Every block of stone has a statue inside it and it is the task of the sculptor to discover it.” Crowned Heads is influenced by a time when quality, pride, and integrity mattered.  We strive to bring our vision to reality and invite you to live in our world.  We are not here to do it like everyone else.  When the rules don’t make sense to us, we carve our own path. We are bonded to a belief in strict attention to detail, and we remain meticulously focused upon every aspect of our products and our brand.  It is an exclusive and select group of retail partners that will offer our brands.  Our goal is not to be everywhere, but rather, to provide an unparalleled level of service, attention, and excellence to those that support Crowned Heads. Bundles of 10 cigars
Tags: Crowned Heads, Full, La Imperiosa, Magicos, nicaragua

Name: Plasencia Alma Fuerte Generacion V Salomon
Description:
Plasencia Alma Fuerte Generacion V Salomon Cigars

  • Size: 7 x 58
  • Strength: Medium to Full-bodied
Plasencia Alma Fuerte, a unique blend of our best-aged tobaccos, grown in our highest quality soil, accentuating their bold, vibrant and intense flavors.  Laced with hints of dark chocolate, plum, and cinnamon, the taste is rounded out with finishing notes of oak and molasses.

About Plasencia Cigars

  • 1865 Don Eduardo Plasencia left The Canary Islands in search of success and opportunity and started growing tobacco in Vuelta Abajo, Cuba.
  • 1963 Castro’s regime confiscated the farms. Don Sixto and his family fled to Mexico with only what they could carry, and later relocated to Nicaragua.
  • 1978 Due to political turmoil, the Plasencia family’s tobacco farms were burned down, forcing the family to move to Honduras.
  • 2015 Plasencia became the largest grower of tobacco in the world with more than 6,000 employees, 4 factories, and 8 plantations in Honduras and Nicaragua, producing 40 million cigars a year.

Name: Oliva Serie V Double Robusto
Short description: Serie V is a complex blend of Nicaraguan long filler tobaccos. Blended with specially fermented Jalapa Valley ligero, and finished with a high priming Habano Sun Grown Wrapper.
Description:
Oliva Cigars Serie V Double Robusto

  • Size: 5 x 54
  • Strength: Full
Serie V is a complex blend of Nicaraguan long filler tobaccos. Blended with specially fermented Jalapa Valley ligero, and finished with a high priming Habano Sun Grown Wrapper. This flavorful blend exhibits complex tobacco with rich coffee and dark chocolate tones. A subtle and well balanced spice is present throughout.

About Oliva Cigars

Melanio Oliva cultivated his first tobacco crop in Pinar Del Rio, Cuba in 1886. His growing operations were suspended while he fought in the Cuban War of Independence. After returning from the war, Melanio resumed his tobacco growing operations. In the early l920’s Melanio’s son Facundo Oliva took over the grow­ing operations. Facundo cultivated the Oliva family tobacco fields for several decades. As Cuba became overrun by the Communists, the tobacco landscape changed. Facundo’s son Gilberto Oliva shifted from growing, to brokering tobacco. In the early 60’s the pressure became too great and Gilberto traveled from country to country in search of the conditions to recreate that distinctive Cuban taste. Boxes of 24 cigars
Tags: double robusto, Full, Habano Sun Grown, nicaragua, Nicaraguan, Nicaraguan (Jalapa Valley Ligero), oliva, oliva series v

Name: Punch Punch 48 (LCDH Edition)
Short description: LCDH Edition cigars are unique cigars made for 'La Casa del Habano' stores. These cigars contain a unique blend of tobacco unavailable anywhere else and in limited quantities.
Description:
Punch Punch 48 (LCDH Edition) Cuban Cigars

  • Size : 5 1/2 x 48
  • Strength : Medium
Punch 48 is a premium cigar made by the Punch brand, which is a part of the General Cigar Company. It is a medium to full-bodied cigar with a blend of Nicaraguan and Honduran fillers, a Nicaraguan binder, and a dark, oily Ecuadorian Habano wrapper. The Punch 48 is known for its rich, complex flavor and smooth, even burn. It is a popular choice among cigar enthusiasts for its outstanding quality and taste. The number "48" in the name refers to the size of the cigar, which has a 48 ring gauge.

About Punch Cigars

Punch is one of the very oldest Habano brands. Don Manuel López of Juan Valle & Co founded it in the mid 19th Century with an eye to the booming British market where a humorous magazine of the same name was much in vogue. A contented Mr Punch, the clown who personified the magazine, is still featured in every box, cigar in hand, and surrounded by 19th Century images of cigar making that remain virtually unchanged over a century and a half later. In 1931 the Punch became associated with Hoyo de Monterrey and the two brands have been made at the same factory ever since. Today the factory is La Corona. Punch’s distinct medium flavour created with a blend of filler and binder tobaccos from Vuelta Abajo is available in a wide variety of sizes all of which are Tripa larga, Totalmente a Mano – long filler, totally hand made.

Name: Rafael Gonzalez Perlas Cuban Cigars
Short description: Subtly pressed with a flat head, this petit corona delivers a lot of smoke for such a small cigar. It's nutty with sweet cedar and a complex walnut liqueur finish.
Description:
Rafael Gonzalez Perlas Cuban Cigars

  • Size : 4 x 40
  • Strength : Medium - Full
Subtly pressed with a flat head, this petit corona delivers a lot of smoke for such a small cigar. It's nutty with sweet cedar and a complex walnut liqueur finish.

About Rafael Gonzalez Cigars

Rafael González was created in the 1930’s. It was in this brand that the 61⁄2 inch (165mm) by 42 gauge cigar, which has the factory name of Cervantes, was first called a Lonsdale after Lord Lonsdale, the famous English sporting Earl and cigar aficionado of that period. Now many other brands use the name as well. On its lid label each box carries a curious inscription written in English to the effect that the cigars should be smoked within one month of the date of shipment from Havana or otherwise they should be carefully matured for about one year.

Name: H. Upmann Cuban Cigars Connoisseur No.2
Short description: This cigar features a dark and oily wrapper that is grown in the Vuelta Abajo region of Cuba, which is known for producing some of the best tobacco in the world. The binder and filler are also made of high-quality Cuban tobacco, resulting in a complex and balanced flavor profile.
Description:
H. Upmann Cuban Cigars Connoisseur No.2

  • Size : 5 1/4 x 51
  • Strength : Mild - Medium
This cigar features a dark and oily wrapper that is grown in the Vuelta Abajo region of Cuba, which is known for producing some of the best tobacco in the world. The binder and filler are also made of high-quality Cuban tobacco, resulting in a complex and balanced flavor profile. When smoked, the H. Upmann Connoisseur No.2 delivers notes of leather, wood, and dark chocolate, with a subtle sweetness on the finish. The cigar has a slow and even burn, allowing the smoker to fully appreciate the flavors and aromas of the tobacco. One of the unique features of the H. Upmann Connoisseur No.2 is that it comes in a beautifully crafted box that includes a built-in humidification system. This ensures that the cigars are stored in optimal conditions, allowing them to age gracefully and develop even more complex flavors over time. Overall, the H. Upmann Connoisseur No.2 is a premium cigar that is perfect for those who enjoy a full-bodied smoke with complex flavors and aromas. It's ideal for special occasions or for those times when you want to indulge in a truly exceptional Cuban cigar.

About H.Upmann Cigars

Upmann is one of the oldest brands of Habanos. It was created in 1844 by the Upmann brothers, who have managed to keep their brand alive until today, being considered an example among the most refined Habanos with a light to medium strength. Quality is one of the brand’s most characteristic elements, demonstrated by the gold medals that adorn its image, obtained by the brand in no less than eleven international fairs during the 19th century. All of the  H. Upmann Habanos are made “Totalmente a Mano con Tripa Larga”- Totally Handmade with Long Filler– with selected leaves from the Vuelta Abajo area*, in the region of Pinar del Río *, Cuba*.
Tags: Connoisseur No. 2, Cuba, h. upmann, Mild-Medium

Name: J.C. Newman Yagua Cigars
Description:
JC Newman Yagua Cigars

  • Size : 6 x 54
  • Strength : Medium
The Yagua is another cigar from Drew Newman, J.C. Newman’s fourth generation. At our J.C. Newman PENSA factory in Nicaragua, Drew heard of an old style of rolling cigars from the factory’s general manager, Lazaro Lopez. Lopez runs the operation down at PENSA and his grandfather used to bundle cigars uniquely in 1940’s Cuba. He would bind the finished cigars together without any molds or presses. Rather, he would use leaves from the Yagua, a Cuban royal palm tree, to give these cigars a shape. The cigars are rolled a little more wet than usual and once the humidity stabilizes, they take the shape of the other cigars inside the leaf. Every Yagua will have a slightly different shape. Packaged in a crate style box, these really give off an antique and rural appearance. A U.S.A. Connecticut Broadleaf wrapper incases Nicaraguan binder and filler tobaccos. Just like the J.C. Newman Cigar, The American, there is nothing else in the industry like it.
Attribute 1 value(s): Single Cigar, 5 Cigars, Box of 20 Cigars

Name: H. Upmann Royal Robusto (LCDH)
Description:
H. Upmann Royal Robusto (LCDH)

  • Size : 5 3/8 x 52
  • Strength : Medium
H. Upmann is one of the most historic Habanos brands. The blend of the brand, characterised by its aroma and light to medium flavour, is made with selected leaves of the best crops of  Vuelta Abajo  zone, in the Pinar del Rio region, Cuba. Its production limited to only 5000 boxes containing 10 Royal Robusto each results in a very exclusive item for those who seek perfection. All Habanos have been produced Totalmente a mano con Tripa larga –Totally by hand long filler- by skillfull rollers. Specially for those connoisseurs who prefer the elegant taste and aroma unmistakably found in the brand.

About H. Upmann

Herman Upmann was a banker from Germany who so loved Cuban cigars that he moved to Havana in 1844 and set up as both banker and cigar maker. His bank closed in the early 1920’s but his cigars live on as a fine example of an elegant, light to medium flavoured Habano. H. Upmann’s blend is composed exclusively of filler and binder tobaccos grown in the Vuelta Abajo zone. Gold medals in no less than eleven international exhibitions during the 19th Century can be found on the brand’s labelled boxes.

Por Larrañaga Gran Robusto Paises Bajos Regional Edition 2017

  • Size: 6 3/10 x 50
  • Strength: Medium
Por Larrañaga Gran Robusto Paises Bajos is a premium cigar made by the Cuban state-run tobacco company Habanos S.A. It is a regional edition cigar, meaning that it is only sold in certain regions and is not widely available. The Gran Robusto Paises Bajos is a medium to full-bodied cigar with a blend of tobacco from the Vuelta Abajo region of Cuba and a Habano 2000 wrapper. It is known for its rich, complex flavor and smooth, even burn. It is a highly sought-after cigar by aficionados of Cuban cigars for its excellent quality and taste. The term "Paises Bajos" means "Netherlands" in Spanish, indicating that this regional edition is only sold in the Netherlands.

  • Strength: Medium-Full
Bolívar Soberano will be presented in a special case of 10 cigars. Soberano is the first launch of the “Duke” vitola de galera, which is totally unprecedented in the brand’s portfolio. This is a strong Habano , allowing the cigar lover to enjoy a balanced and aromatic blend from the brand in a totally novel format. Habanos Limited Editions are greatly appreciated and cigar enthusiasts await their arrival with great anticipation every year. They are characterized by the fact that their vitolas are not found in the brand’s regular portfolio and they are distinguished by the careful selection of all of the leaves – capa, tripa and capote(wrapper, filler and binder) – which have been aged for a period of not less than 2 years. All the Habanos that make up the Limited Editions are made “Totalmente a Mano con Tripa Larga – Totally Handmade with Long Filler” from selected leaves from the Vuelta Abajo area, in the region of  Pinar del Río, Cuba, in very small quantities and by expert Cuban cigar rollers, who work painstakingly to meet the expectations of the most demanding Habano lovers.

About Bolivar Cigars

Bolivar is among the strongest, most full bodied of all Habanos. It boasts an unrivaled richness of flavour in is blend of Vuelta Abajo  zone filler and binder tobaccos that makes it one of the most sought-after marques amongst experienced smokers.  Made using the Tripa Larga, Totalmente a Mano - long filler, totally by hand - technique and is the brand of choice for enthusiasts who enjoy strong flavours.
Tags: Cuba, Medium-Full, Parejo

Name: Punch Punch Cuban Cigars
Description:
Punch Punch Cuban Cigars

  • Size : 5 1/2 x 46
  • Strength : Medium
Punch Punch is a premium cigar made by the Punch brand, which is a part of the General Cigar Company. It is a medium-bodied cigar with a blend of Dominican and Nicaraguan fillers, a Connecticut Broadleaf binder, and an Ecuadorian Habano wrapper. The Punch Punch is known for its rich, complex flavor and smooth, even burn. It is a popular choice among cigar enthusiasts for its outstanding quality and taste. The term "Cuban" in the name of the cigar is likely a reference to the style of the cigar, which is similar to the cigars made in Cuba. However, the Punch Punch is not actually made in Cuba and is not a true Cuban cigar.

About Punch Cigars

Punch is one of the very oldest Habano brands. Don Manuel López of Juan Valle & Co founded it in the mid 19th Century with an eye to the booming British market where a humorous magazine of the same name was much in vogue. A contented Mr Punch, the clown who personified the magazine, is still featured in every box, cigar in hand, and surrounded by 19th Century images of cigar making that remain virtually unchanged over a century and a half later. In 1931 the Punch became associated with Hoyo de Monterrey and the two brands have been made at the same factory ever since. Today the factory is La Corona. Punch’s distinct medium flavour created with a blend of filler and binder tobaccos from Vuelta Abajo is available in a wide variety of sizes all of which are Tripa larga, Totalmente a Mano – long filler, totally hand made.
Tags: Cuba, Medium, Punch Punch, tubos

Name: Bolivar Short Bolivar Andorra Regional Edition 2017
Description:
Bolivar Short Bolivar Andorra Regional Edition 2017

  • Size : 4 x 50
  • Strength : Mild-Medium
Bolivar Andorra is a premium cigar made by the Cuban state-run tobacco company Habanos S.A. It is a full-bodied cigar with a blend of tobacco from the Vuelta Abajo region of Cuba and a dark, oily wrapper. The Andorra is known for its rich, complex flavor and strong, earthy aroma. It is a popular choice among aficionados of Cuban cigars for its excellent quality and taste. The Short Bolivar Andorra is a smaller version of the regular Andorra, with a shorter length and a smaller ring gauge. It is ideal for those who prefer a shorter, more concentrated smoke.

About Bolivar Cigars

Simón Bolívar is one of the great figures of the 19th century. He has gone down in history as the Liberator of a large part of South America from Spanish rule. The Bolívar brand was created in 1902. Today it is based at the Partagás factory in downtown Havana.

Description:
Hoyo De Monterrey Petit Belicoso Humidor 2017

  • Size : 5 x 52
  • Strength : Mild-Medium
Hoyo de Monterrey Petit Belicosos (52 ring gauge x125 mm length) is one of the favoured Habanos for those who enjoy the heavy ring gauge format in a short smoking time. The Hoyo de Monterrey brand is located on the fertile riverbanks of the tobacco-growing district of San Juan y Martínez , in Cuba. The soft flavour of its blend promises a more appealing option for those who prefer a more delicate and aromatic Habano with an elegant and complex character.

Name: Romeo Y Julieta Cedros De Luxe (LCDH)
Description:
Romeo Y Julieta Cedros De Luxe (LCDH)

  • Size : 5 1/2 x 50
  • Strength : Medium
Romeo y Julieta Cedros De Luxe is a premium cigar made by the famous Cuban cigar brand Romeo y Julieta. It is a medium to full-bodied cigar with a blend of tobacco from the Vuelta Abajo region of Cuba and a cedar-aged wrapper. The Cedros De Luxe is known for its complex flavor profile, with notes of nuts, wood, and spices. It is a highly regarded cigar among aficionados of Cuban cigars for its outstanding quality and taste.

About Romeo Y Julieta

Named after William Shakespeare’s tragic lovers, the origins of Romeo y Julieta as a Habano date back to 1875. The brand rose to international fame during the early years of the 20th Century under the direction of Don ‘Pepin’ Rodríguez, a talented promoter, who was amongst the first to recognise the power of the cigar band. During his hey day no less than 20,000 different bands were used in production. Winston Churchill became a devotee of the brand. Following his visit to Havana in 1946, his name has not only been commemorated on a band but it has also served to describe the marque’s most famous size – Romeo y Julieta Churchills.
Tags: Cuba, LCDH, Robusto, Romeo Y Julieta

Name: Trinidad Topes
Description:
Trinidad Cigars Topes

  • Size: 5 x 56
  • Strength: Medium - Full
Trinidad Topes is a premium cigar made by the Trinidad brand, which is a part of the Cuban state-run tobacco company Habanos S.A. It is a medium-bodied cigar with a Habano 2000 wrapper and a blend of tobacco from the Vuelta Abajo region of Cuba. The Trinidad Topes is known for its complex flavor profile, with notes of coffee, spices, and wood. It is a highly sought-after cigar by aficionados of Cuban cigars for its excellent quality and taste.

About Trinidad Cigars

Trinidad, as a Habanos brand, dates back to 1969 but for many years, like Cohiba, it was made only for gifts to foreign diplomats. Not until 1998 was it released for general sale.  For several years Trinidad was made at El Laguito, the Cohiba factory,  where its uniquely fragrant and aromatic, medium flavoured blend of filler and binder leaves from the Vuelta Abajo zone was developed.  Made using the Tripa Larga, Totalmente a Mano - long filler, totally by hand - technique.

Name: Drew Estate Herrera Esteli Habano Edicion Limitada Lancero
Short description: Herrera Esteli is a medium plus blend with an exceptional amount of creaminess and great balance of spice and sweet.
Description:
Drew Estate Cigars Herrera Esteli Habano Edicion Limitada Lancero

  • Size: 7 x 38
  • Strength: Medium
Herrera Esteli is the brainchild of Willy Herrera, newest member of the Drew Estate team. Willy’s presence at Drew Estate is notable, as he brings an authentic Cuban influence to the team. Herrera Esteli is a medium plus blend with an exceptional amount of creaminess and great balance of spice and sweet. Herrera Esteli will be available at select retailers in 25ct Slide Lid Boxes. The brand will feature five sizes, including the Short Corona Gorda, Robusta Extra, Lonsdale Deluxe, Toro Especial, and Piramide Fino. JD speaks about Willy coming on board at Drew Estate: “Unlike most companies, we have decided to take the slow and low approach to his joining our team. Basically, we stuck him in Nica for over a year at a bench and gave him the key to our tobacco and said: “Create a great cigar…” We gave him no boundaries or limits. Willy then spent forever working on this first blend… drove me a little crazy, made a lot of bad blends along the way, but I think we overwhelmed him a bit – I don’t think he was prepared to have so many tobaccos to blend from, rather daunting… our man Nicholas helped nudge him a little here and there and voila! Willy created something I consider great. Along the journey, Willy has become an exceptional handmade cigar bunchero and rolero. Check him out when he is in a store near you! Ask him tons of questions while you’re at it!”
Tags: Drew Estate, drew estate herrera esteli, Ecuadorian Habano, Honduras, Lancero, Medium, Nicaraguan, Parejo

Name: Drew Estate Undercrown Maduro Belicoso
Short description:
Incorporating many of the same rare tobaccos, but of different vintages and primings, the cigar they created was no mere replacement. Rather it is an exceptional smoking experience of uncompromising quality and flavor that deserves to be smoked by all.

Blend Summary:

Capa: Otapan Negro Último Corte Capote: T52 Connecticut River Valley Stalk Cut & Cured Habano Tripa: Select Brazilian Mata Fina and Nicaraguan Cuban Seed Strength: Medium to Medium-Full Packaging: 25-ct Display Cabinet BN Boxes Taste Profile: Lush, smooth and creamy with a natural inherent sweetness. Cigar Style: Refined and balance with excellent depth for the smoker.
Description:
Drew Estate Cigars Undercrown Belicoso

  • Size: 6 x 52
  • Strength: Medium-Full

About Undercrown Cigars

In early 2009 we asked our torcedores to smoke less Liga Privada cigars because they were leaving too few to be exported. This request was met with the disappointment you would expect, but rather than being disgruntled they responded by blending their own signature liga. Incorporating many of the same rare tobaccos, but of different vintages and primings, the cigar they created was no mere replacement. Rather it is an exceptional smoking experience of uncompromising quality and flavor that deserves to be smoked by all. It is always the master makers who are heralded, but the reality is that great cigars are the product of many talented people, most of whom toil in factories with no publicity ever. They are the uncelebrated heroes who make all of our lives more pleasurable with the cigars they craft. And therefore, it is with great pleasure that we are now sharing their factory floor creation with you as Undercrown, borne of our worker’s ingenuity, resourcefulness and passion for a great cigar. Cigars are in original packaging.
Tags: Drew Estate, drew estate undercrown, Medium-Full, Otapan Negro Último Corte, Parejo, Select Brazilian Mata Fina and Nicaraguan Cuban Seed, T52 Connecticut River Valley Stalk Cut & Cured Habano

Name: Punch Coronations Tubos Cuban Cigars
Description:
Punch Coronations Tubos Cuban Cigars

  • Size : 5 1/8 x 42
  • Strength : Medium
Punch Coronations Tubos is a cigar made by Punch Cigars, a brand known for their rich, flavorful cigars. The Coronations size is a small, petit corona-style cigar with a length of 4 1/2 inches and a 42 ring gauge. It comes packaged in a metal tube, which helps to protect the cigar and maintain its freshness. This cigar is made with a blend of aged Dominican tobaccos for the filler and binder, wrapped in a reddish-brown Ecuadorian Sumatra wrapper leaf. It is known for its rich, complex flavors and medium-bodied strength. It is a popular choice among cigar enthusiasts for its balance and elegance.

About Punch Cigars

Punch is one of the very oldest Habano brands. Don Manuel López of Juan Valle & Co founded it in the mid 19th Century with an eye to the booming British market where a humorous magazine of the same name was much in vogue. A contented Mr. Punch, the clown who personified the magazine, is still featured in every box, cigar in hand, and surrounded by 19th Century images of cigar making that remain virtually unchanged over a century and a half later. In 1931 the Punch became associated with Hoyo de Monterrey and the two brands have been made at the same factory ever since. Today the factory is La Corona. Punch’s distinct medium flavour created with a blend of filler and binder tobaccos from Vuelta Abajo is available in a wide variety of sizes all of which are Tripa larga, Totalmente a Mano – long filler, totally hand made.

Name: Crowned Heads La Imperiosa Dukes
Description:
Crowned Heads Cigars La Imperiosa Dukes

  • Size: 5 1/2 x 54
  • Strength: Full
Originally a Cuban brand from the early 1900’s, La Imperiosa translates to ‘the imperative,’ or, “..that which is absolutely necessary or required.” The La Imperiosa artwork and band were inspired by the original Cuban vista and band of years gone by. TASTING NOTES: Opens big with a burst of red pepper, before easing off the throttle and settling onto the palate with dense and multi-layered notes of dark fruit, earth, and charred meat. The flavor is at once dense and approachable, with a massively-brooding muscular structure.

About Crowned Heads Cigars

Crowned Heads is a premium cigar company committed to producing cigars of artisanal quality that are defined by a combination of excellent flavor, balance, and consistency. We believe in continuous improvement, and in a marriage of tradition with innovation.  We feel that tobacco lives, breathes, and speaks to us; it leads the blend and it names the brand.  As Michelangelo once said, “Every block of stone has a statue inside it and it is the task of the sculptor to discover it.” Crowned Heads is influenced by a time when quality, pride, and integrity mattered.  We strive to bring our vision to reality and invite you to live in our world.  We are not here to do it like everyone else.  When the rules don’t make sense to us, we carve our own path. We are bonded to a belief in strict attention to detail, and we remain meticulously focused upon every aspect of our products and our brand.  It is an exclusive and select group of retail partners that will offer our brands.  Our goal is not to be everywhere, but rather, to provide an unparalleled level of service, attention, and excellence to those that support Crowned Heads. Bundles of 10 cigars

Description:
La Gloria Cubana Cuban Cigars Invictos Regional Edition Italy 2017

  • Size : 4 7/8 x 50
  • Strength : Mild-Medium

About La Gloria Cubana Cigars

La Gloria Cubana, founded in 1885,  is a little known jewel amongst Habano brands, nevertheless it enjoys a long history, its name alone clearly defines its origin. The brand is characterized by its elegant presentation, especially in the Medaille d’Or Series. All the vitolas are Tripa Larga, Totalmente a Mano – long filler, totally hand made. The blend, made from filler and binder tobaccos grown in the Vuelta Abajo region, is classified as medium and offers well-balanced nuances of taste and aroma.

Name: El Rey Del Mundo Petit Cayo
Description:
El Rey Del Mundo Cuban Cigars Petit Cayo Regional Edition Andorra 2018

  • Size: 4 1/3 x 52
  • Strength: Mild-Medium

About El Rey Del Mundo Cigars

In 1882, and under the aegis of Antonio Allones, who had started producing Habanos over 30 years in Havana, it was decided to launch a brand of premium quality and price, with a name that quickly became known for its great dose of pretense: “The King of the World”. This success lives on to this day in a selected range of Habanos renowned for its light to medium flavour and consistency by the most demanding smokers. It is a brand that it has been used a lot in regional editions. All of the Habanos are made “Totalmente a Mano con Tripa Larga”- Totally Handmade with Long Filler” with filler and wrapper leaves coming from the zone, in region, Cuba.
Tags: Andorra Seleccion, Cuba, El Rey del Mundo, Habanos, Mild-Medium, Petit Cayo, Regional Edition 2018, short robusto

Name: Rocky Patel The Edge Maduro B-52
Description:
Rocky Patel The Edge Maduro B-52

\n\nThe Rocky Patel The Edge Maduro is a premium cigar made by Rocky Patel Premium Cigars. It is part of the Rocky Patel The Edge line of cigars, which are known for their bold, full-bodied flavor and dark, oily, Maduro wrappers. The Edge Maduro cigars are made with sun-grown Cuban-seed tobacco that has been fermented for an extended period of time, giving the wrapper a distinct flavor and adding to the cigar's overall complexity. The Edge Maduro is available in a variety of sizes, including Robusto, Toro, and Torpedo. The cigar has a full-bodied flavor with notes of earth, pepper, and chocolate. It is packaged in boxes of 20 cigars.
Tags: rocky patel the edge

Name: Rocky Patel The Edge Maduro Battalion
Description:
Rocky Patel The Edge Battalion Maduro

\n\nThe Rocky Patel The Edge Maduro Battalion is a cigar that is part of the Rocky Patel The Edge line of premium cigars. The Edge Maduro cigars are known for their dark, oily, Maduro wrappers, which are made from sun-grown Cuban-seed tobacco that has been fermented for an extended period of time. This gives the wrapper a distinct flavor and adds to the cigar's overall complexity. The Edge Maduro Battalion is a 6 inch long cigar with a 60 ring gauge. It features a Maduro wrapper, a Nicaraguan binder, and a blend of Nicaraguan and Honduran long-filler tobaccos. The cigar has a full-bodied flavor with notes of earth, pepper, and chocolate. It is packaged in boxes of 20 cigars.

Padron 1964 Monarca Natural
Description:
Padron 1964 Monarca Natural

The Padrón 1964 Anniversary Series line was introduced in 1994 to commemorate our company’s 30th anniversary. This line consists of sixteen sizes all available in sun-grown natural and maduro wrappers. All tobacco used in this limited production series is aged for four years, creating a smooth and complex flavor. In honor of the age-old Cuban tradition of box-pressing cigars, the 1964 Anniversary line was introduced as a box-pressed series. For the protection of our customers we have introduced measures to safeguard against counterfeiting with a specially designed double band featuring an individually numbered guarantee label. The Padrón 1964 Anniversary Series is consistently ranked by industry experts as one of the top brands in the world.

About Padron Cigars

This limited production 45 Years Family reserve cigar comes in a 10-count package of box-pressed cigars, available in both Natural and Maduro wrappers. This cigar is made with tobacco aged 10 years. Founded in 1964 and evolving throughout our history, the Padrón Series today consists of fifteen medium to full-bodied, long-filler cigars ranging from Panatelas to the large “A” size Magnum.
Tags: padron

Name: Aladino Corojo Toro
Description:
Aladino Cigars Corojo Toro

Size: 6 x 50 Wrapper: Authentic Corojo Binder: Authentic Corojo Filler: Authentic Corojo The Aladino Corojo Toro is a premium cigar made by JRE Tobacco Company. JRE stands for Julio R. Eiroa, the owner of the company and the son of renowned cigar maker Julio Eiroa. The Aladino Corojo Toro is part of the Aladino line of cigars, which are known for their use of Honduran Corojo tobacco in the blend. Corojo tobacco is a type of Cuban-seed tobacco that is grown in Honduras and is known for its robust flavor and aroma. The Aladino Corojo Toro is a 6 inch long cigar with a 52 ring gauge. It features a Honduran Corojo wrapper and a blend of Honduran Corojo and Criollo tobaccos for the filler and binder. The cigar has a medium-to-full body and a rich, complex flavor profile with notes of wood, spice, and a hint of sweetness. It is packaged in boxes of 20 cigars.

About Aladino Cigars

JRE Tobacco is a family centered company, founded by Julio R. Eiroa and his son Justo M. Eiroa, together they manage all aspects of the cigar growing and manufacturing for your enjoyment. This is a crop to shop operation as we like to call it. We are fully committed to providing sustained quality and satisfaction on every Aladino, Rancho Luna and Tatascan we make. This self-imposed standard covers the entire cigar manufacturing process. Our commitment to quality and consumer satisfaction is never compromised or circumvented. As the premier Corojo grower in the industry, I, Julio Eiroa, Master Cigar Blender and Tobacco grower, guarantee that all our brands will provide you the opportunity to enjoy an Authentic Corojo taste, the same as cigars from the 1960’s. Join us on this journey and be part of a history making cigar smoking experience
Tags: Aladino, Authentic Corojo, Honduras, Medium-Full, toro
Attribute 1 value(s): Single Cigar, 5 Cigars, Box of 20 Cigars, Box of 10 Cigars

Name: Oliva Serie O Robusto
Short description: Made in the original Cuban tradition of growing the same Habano seed in diverse regions of the country to produce a distinct blend.
Description:
Oliva Cigars Serie O Robusto

  • Size: 5 x 50
  • Strength: Medium
Serie O is a Nicaraguan Puro. Made in the original Cuban tradition of growing the same Habano seed in diverse regions of the country to produce a distinct blend. This blend was achieved by growing Habano in Esteli, Condega and Jalapa Valley. Boxes of 20 cigars

Name: Oliva Serie V Double Robusto Tubos
Short description: Serie V is a complex blend of Nicaraguan long filler tobaccos. Blended with specially fermented Jalapa Valley ligero, and finished with a high priming Habano Sun Grown Wrapper.
Description:
Oliva Serie V Double Robusto Tubos

  • Size: 5 x 54
  • Strength: Medium-Full
Serie V is a complex blend of Nicaraguan long filler tobaccos. Blended with specially fermented Jalapa Valley ligero, and finished with a high priming Habano Sun Grown Wrapper. This flavorful blend exhibits complex tobacco with rich coffee and dark chocolate tones. A subtle and well balanced spice is present throughout.

About Oliva Cigars

Melanio Oliva cultivated his first tobacco crop in Pinar Del Rio, Cuba in 1886. His growing operations were suspended while he fought in the Cuban War of Independence. After returning from the war, Melanio resumed his tobacco growing operations. In the early l920’s Melanio’s son Facundo Oliva took over the grow­ing operations. Facundo cultivated the Oliva family tobacco fields for several decades. As Cuba became overrun by the Communists, the tobacco landscape changed. Facundo’s son Gilberto Oliva shifted from growing, to brokering tobacco. In the early 60’s the pressure became too great and Gilberto traveled from country to country in search of the conditions to recreate that distinctive Cuban taste. Boxes of 12 cigars
Tags: double robusto, Full, Habano Sun Grown, nicaragua, Nicaraguan, Nicaraguan (Jalapa Valley Ligero), oliva, oliva series v

Name: Escobar Natural Sampler Series
Description:
Escobar Natural Sampler Series

\n\nEscobar Natural (a.k.a. Habano) Premium Cigars are a hand-crafted medium-to-strong bodied cigar with a perfectly smooth draw and a long lingering finish. They are a blend of three vintage sun-grown and aged Habano tobaccos grown specifically in the rich volcanic soil of Nicaragua. These blended and balanced flavors of the Escobar Cigar are dominated by vanilla and white pepper flavor, dried fruit, cocoa and caramel that sticks strongly to the palate with delicious density, and possesses a persistent earthy flavor of leather and Chinese spices. These flavors are blended to provide the complexity of the Escobar Cigar, thanks to the fermentation and aging process that only Puros Privados offers from generations of skilled Cuban cigar makers.
Categories: Cigars, Cigars > Non-Cuban Cigars, Cigars > Samplers

Name: Escobar Maduro Sampler Series
Description:
Escobar Maduro Sampler Series

\n\nEscobar Maduro Premium Cigars are a hand-crafted medium-bodied cigar with a perfectly smooth draw and a long lingering finish. They are a blend of three vintage sun grown and aged Habano tobaccos grown specifically in the rich volcanic soil of Nicaragua. These blended and balanced flavors of the Escobar Cigar are dominated by chocolate and black pepper flavor, dry coffee and firewood that sticks strongly to the palate with delicious density and possesses a persistent flavor of roasted nuts and wood smoke. These flavors are blended to provide the complexity of the Escobar Cigar, thanks to the fermentation and aging process that only Puros Privados offers from generations of skilled Cuban cigar makers.
Categories: Cigars, Cigars > Non-Cuban Cigars, Cigars > Samplers

Name: Arturo Fuente Cuban Corona
Description:
Arturo Fuente Cigars Cuban Corona

\n\nThe Arturo Fuente Cuban Corona is a cigar that is often mistaken for a Cuban cigar due to its name and similar appearance. However, it is not a true Cuban cigar as it is made in the Dominican Republic by the Arturo Fuente cigar company. The Cuban Corona has a medium to full-bodied flavor with a blend of Dominican and Nicaraguan fillers and a Cameroon wrapper. It is known for its smooth and creamy flavor with notes of wood and spice.
Tags: Arturo Fuente, corona, Cuban Corona, Dominican Republic, New Arrivals

About Punch Cuban Cigars

Punch is one of the oldest Habanos brands. Don Manuel López de Juan Valle and Cia founded this brand in the mid-19th century, with the idea of ​​attacking the growing English market, where a humorous publication of the same name was in vogue in those days.

Name: Quai D'Orsay No.54
Description:
Quai D'Orsay No.54

  • Size: 5 1/3 X 54
  • Strength: Mild
The No. 54 was released in 2017 as part of a rebranding effort for the Quai D'Orsay line, which included a new logo and updated packaging. The cigar is a Grand Corona size, measuring 5 3/4 inches (146mm) in length with a ring gauge of 54. It is made entirely from Cuban tobacco, including a wrapper from the Vuelta Abajo region, which is considered to be one of the best tobacco-growing regions in the world. The flavor profile of the Quai D'Orsay No. 54 is described as medium-bodied with notes of wood, earth, leather, and a hint of sweetness. It has received positive reviews from cigar enthusiasts and critics alike, with many noting its smoothness and balance. Overall, the Quai D'Orsay No. 54 is a high-quality cigar that is well-suited for those who prefer medium-bodied smokes with a nuanced flavor profile.

About Quai D'Orsay Cigars

This brand owes its origin to the refined taste of the French market. Created in the 1970's, and named after a well-known street in Paris.  Made with a light tasting blend of filler and binder leaves from the Vuelta Abajo zone. Its wrapper is distinguished by its  Claro (light brown) color.   Made using the Tripa Larga, Totalmente a Mano - long filler, totally hand made - technique.
Tags: corona, Cuba, Parejo, Quai D'Orsay
Attribute 1 value(s): Single, 5 Cigars, Box of 25, Box of 10

Name: Perla Del Mar Robusto Corojo
Description:
Perla Del Mar Cigars Robusto Corojo

  • Size: 4 3/4 x 52
  • Strength: Mild to medium

About Perla Del Mar Cigars

Perla del Mar cigars were first conceived in the late 19th Century to honor Cuba’s highly acclaimed cigar heritage. Because Cuba’s rich, fertile soil formerly created the most flavorful cigar tobacco in the world, Cuba was known as the Pearl of the Sea. Now, more than a century later, J.C. Newman Cigar Co. has recreated Perla del Mar, handmade in the J.C. Newman PENSA cigar factory in Estelí, Nicaragua. Today’s Perla del Mar is a rich and flavorful tribute to its original Cuban blend.

Perla del Mar features special, hand-selected, aged binder and long filler tobaccos from three distinct regions in the lush mountains of Nicaragua. This unique blend is combined with a smooth, creamy Ecuadorian Shade or hardy Connecticut Broadleaf wrapper to provide a complex, but balanced, taste.  Lastly, Perla del Mar cigars are box pressed to help the natural flavors of its unique tobaccos to marry together and deliver an extremely satisfying smoke.
Tags: COROJO, Perla Del Mar, Robusto
Attribute 1 value(s): Single Cigar, Box of 25 Cigars, 5 Cigars
Attribute 11 value(s): Nicaragua (Pueblo Nuevo| La Reina| Condega and Jalapa), Nicaraguan

Name: Padron 1964 Superior Natural
Description:
Padron 1964 Superior Natural

The Padrón 1964 Anniversary Series line was introduced in 1994 to commemorate our company’s 30th anniversary. This line consists of sixteen sizes all available in sun-grown natural and maduro wrappers. All tobacco used in this limited production series is aged for four years, creating a smooth and complex flavor. In honor of the age-old Cuban tradition of box-pressing cigars, the 1964 Anniversary line was introduced as a box-pressed series. For the protection of our customers we have introduced measures to safeguard against counterfeiting with a specially designed double band featuring an individually numbered guarantee label. The Padrón 1964 Anniversary Series is consistently ranked by industry experts as one of the top brands in the world.  

About Padron Cigars

This limited production 45 Years Family reserve cigar comes in a 10-count package of box-pressed cigars, available in both Natural and Maduro wrappers. This cigar is made with tobacco aged 10 years. Founded in 1964 and evolving throughout our history, the Padrón Series today consists of fifteen medium to full-bodied, long-filler cigars ranging from Panatelas to the large “A” size Magnum.

Tags: Hermoso, Maduro, padron

Name: Montecristo Wide Edmundo
Short description: The original Montecristo range of sizes was composed of a narrow assortment numbered from 1 to 5. Today it consists of a wide variety of vitolas to cover every level of the cigar enthusiast’s needs.
Description:
Montecristo Cuban Cigars Wide Edmundo

  • Size: 4 7/8 x 54
  • Strength: Medium-Full
The original Montecristo range of sizes was composed of a narrow assortment numbered from 1 to 5. Today it consists of a wide variety of vitolas to cover every level of the cigar enthusiast’s needs.

About Montecristo Cigars

Montecristo’s perfectly balanced blends are created exclusively with select filler and binder leaves from the Vuelta Abajo zone, home of the finest tobaccos in the world.  They offer a distinguished aroma and appeal equally to new and experienced smokers. Made using the Tripa Larga, Totalmente a Mano – long filler, totally by hand – technique. Montecristo is the best known and probably the most appreciated brand of Habanos throughout the world. It forms the benchmark for many Habanos smokers against which other brands are judged. The name comes from the hero of Alexandre Dumas’ famous novel ‘The Count of Montecristo’, which was a firm favourite when read by the Lector to the Torcedores (cigar makers) at the factory where it was founded in 1935.
Tags: Cuba, Medium-Full, montecristo, Parejo, Robusto
Attribute 1 value(s): Box of 25, 5 Cigars, Single, Box of 10 Cigars

Name: Aladino Corojo Lancero
Description:
Aladino Cigars Corojo Lancero

  • Size: 7 x 38
  • Strength: Medium-Full
The Aladino Corojo Lancero is a premium cigar made by JRE Tobacco Company. JRE stands for Julio R. Eiroa, the owner of the company and the son of renowned cigar maker Julio Eiroa. The Aladino Corojo Lancero is part of the Aladino line of cigars, which are known for their use of Honduran Corojo tobacco in the blend. Corojo tobacco is a type of Cuban-seed tobacco that is grown in Honduras and is known for its robust flavor and aroma. The Aladino Corojo Lancero is a 7 inch long cigar with a 38 ring gauge. It features a Honduran Corojo wrapper and a blend of Honduran Corojo and Criollo tobaccos for the filler and binder. The cigar has a medium-to-full body and a rich, complex flavor profile with notes of wood, spice, and a hint of sweetness. It is packaged in bundles of 20 cigars.

About Aladino Cigars

JRE Tobacco is a family centered company, founded by Julio R. Eiroa and his son Justo M. Eiroa, together they manage all aspects of the cigar growing and manufacturing for your enjoyment. This is a crop to shop operation as we like to call it. We are fully committed to providing sustained quality and satisfaction on every Aladino, Rancho Luna and Tatascan we make. This self-imposed standard covers the entire cigar manufacturing process. Our commitment to quality and consumer satisfaction is never compromised or circumvented. As the premier Corojo grower in the industry, I, Julio Eiroa, Master Cigar Blender and Tobacco grower, guarantee that all our brands will provide you the opportunity to enjoy an Authentic Corojo taste, the same as cigars from the 1960’s. Join us on this journey and be part of a history making cigar smoking experience

Name: AJ Fernandez Enclave Broadleaf Toro
Short description: Enclave is a medium- to full-bodied cigar made using a Habano Rosado wrapper from Ecuador, Cameroon binder and filler tobaccos from Nicaragua.
Description:
AJ Fernandez Cigars Enclave Broadleaf Toro

  • Size: 6 x 52
  • Strength: Medium to Full-Bodied
The Enclave blend was a special collaboration between A.J. and his father, Ismael Fernandez. The new Enclave cigar is adorned with a cigar ring that depicts images of Native Americans, a representation of the original tobacco enclave.

About AJ Fernandez Cigars

AJ’s first collaboration with his Father Ismael is a nod to the discovery of tobacco by Christopher Columbus and its introduction to the rest of the world in 1492.

Raised in Cuba and steeped in the rich tradition of Fernandez cigar legacy, AJ Fernandez produces unparalleled premium cigars in Esteli, Nicaragua. Ensuring superior quality, the day-to-day operations at Tabacalera AJ Fernandez are managed under the watchful eye of AJ himself. Through a fusion of inherited technique and learned patience, Fernandez’ long filler tobaccos are grown from prized seeds which are proprietary only to the Fernandez family. Perhaps the most essential quality of the AJ Fernandez line of cigars is the perspective and motivation of AJ, as well as the history of the Fernandez family.

Name: Luis Martinez Hamilton Robusto
Description:
Luis Martinez Hamilton Robusto

  • Size: 4 7/8 x 49

About Luis Martinez Cigars

Our factory in Esteli, Nicaragua has produced some of the richest treasures of Central America, exclusively for The Luis Martinez Cigar Company. Luis Martinez Nicaraguan Silver Selection is a cigar born from the jet black, mineral rich soil of Central America. It is the careful blending of tobaccos from this region that give this cigar its medium body and smooth, full flavor. Never before have we combined the flavors of Central American filler, a Honduran Cuban Seed Binder and an Ecuadorian Sungrown Wrapper to create such an exceptional cigar. Try these handmade riches for yourself and taste why they have earned the right to be considered one of our most prized possessions.

Name: Partagas Chicos Puritos Cigarillos
Short description: Like all cigarillos, it is rolled with short filler, and comes precut and with no bands. Despite its small size compared to other Partagas vitolas, it retains all the strength and taste of its bigger brothers in a short 20 minutes smoke.
Description:
Partagas Chicos Puritos Cuban Cigarillos

  • Size: 4 1/2 x 29
  • Strength: Medium-Full
Like all cigarillos, it is rolled with short filler, and comes precut and with no bands. Despite its small size compared to other Partagas vitolas, it retains all the strength and taste of its bigger brothers in a short 20 minutes smoke. About Partgas Cigars A Partagas is immediately recognized  by its deep, earthy flavour. The character of its blend springs from a selection of filler and binder tobaccos grown in the Vuelta Abajo zone, chosen for their unmistakable richness of flavour and aroma.  Made using the Tripa Larga, Totalmente a Mano – long filler, totally hand made- technique.

About Saint Luis Rey Cigars

“Saint Luis Rey” refers to the town of San Luis, located in the heart of the Vuelta Abajo tobacco zone, which is particularly famous for the superb wrapper leaves produced there.  Saint Luis Rey enjoys a reputation among Habanos lovers for the intensity of their flavour.  Made with filler and binder leaves from the Vuelta Abajo zone using the Tripa Larga, Totalmente a Mano – long filler, totally hand made – method.

Name: Romeo Y Julieta Wide Churchills
Short description: Romeo Y Julieta's balanced and aromatic blend of selected filler and binder leaves from the Vuelta Abajo zone make it the classic medium bodied Habano.   Made using the Tripa Larga, Totalmente a Mano - long filler, totally made by hand - technique.
Description:
Romeo Y Julieta Wide Churchills Cuban Cigars

  • Size: 5 1/8 x 55
  • Strength: Medium
Winston Churchill became a devotee of  Romeo Y Julieta, following his visit to Havana in 1946. His name has been commemorated by using it to describe the marque's favorite cigar size - Romeo Y Julieta Churchills. Launched at the 12th Festival del Habano in 2010, the Wide Churchill boasts a 55 ring gauge to coincide with the trend for stouter girth vitolas.  Romeo Y Julieta's balanced and aromatic blend of selected filler and binder leaves from the Vuelta Abajo zone make it the classic medium bodied Habano.   Made using the Tripa Larga, Totalmente a Mano - long filler, totally made by hand - technique.

Name: Alec Bradley Post Embargo Robusto
Short description: Here’s to the privilege to taste the past as the gap is bridged and enjoy the pleasures the future has to offer. The brighter future is here and glimmering with hope.
Description:
Alec Bradley Cigars Post Embargo Robusto

Size: 5 x 52 Strength: Medium to Full
For many, the 1960’s represented a chasm that would throw many cigar enthusiasts into a dilemma. For some, it served as an avenue to explore the tobaccos of different countries and regions. For others, this embargo offered up opportunities for bootlegging and counterfeiting for those who would desperately do anything to get that Cuban leaf into their hands. Today we pay homage to this history with Post Embargo. Here’s to the privilege to taste the past as the gap is bridged and enjoy the pleasures the future has to offer. The brighter future is here and glimmering with hope.
Tags: Alec Bradley, Dominican Republic, Honduras, Medium-Full, nicaragua, Parejo, Post Embargo, Robusto
Attribute 1 value(s): Single Cigar, Box of 20 Cigars, 5 Cigars

Name: Drew Estate Herrera Esteli Habano Robusto Grande
Short description: Herrera Esteli is a medium plus blend with an exceptional amount of creaminess and great balance of spice and sweet.
Description:
Drew Estate Cigars Herrera Esteli Habano Robusto Grande

  • Size: 5 1/4 x 52
  • Strength: Medium
Rated 15th Best Cigar of the Year by Cigar Aficionado
Herrera Esteli is the brainchild of Willy Herrera, newest member of the Drew Estate team. Willy’s presence at Drew Estate is notable, as he brings an authentic Cuban influence to the team. Herrera Esteli is a medium plus blend with an exceptional amount of creaminess and great balance of spice and sweet. Herrera Esteli will be available at select retailers in 25ct Slide Lid Boxes. The brand will feature five sizes, including the Short Corona Gorda, Robusta Extra, Lonsdale Deluxe, Toro Especial, and Piramide Fino. JD speaks about Willy coming on board at Drew Estate: “Unlike most companies, we have decided to take the slow and low approach to his joining our team. Basically, we stuck him in Nica for over a year at a bench and gave him the key to our tobacco and said: “Create a great cigar…” We gave him no boundaries or limits. Willy then spent forever working on this first blend… drove me a little crazy, made a lot of bad blends along the way, but I think we overwhelmed him a bit – I don’t think he was prepared to have so many tobaccos to blend from, rather daunting… our man Nicholas helped nudge him a little here and there and voila! Willy created something I consider great. Along the journey, Willy has become an exceptional handmade cigar bunchero and rolero. Check him out when he is in a store near you! Ask him tons of questions while you’re at it!”
Tags: Cigar Aficionado Top 25 2021, Drew Estate, drew estate herrera esteli, Ecuadorian Habano, Honduras, Medium, Nicaraguan, Parejo, Robusto, robusto grande
Attribute 1 value(s): Single Cigar, Pack of 5 Cigars, Box of 12 Cigars

Name: Brick House Churchill Double Connecticut
Short description: Puff after puff you’ll be met with tame hints of sweet cedar, cream, and toast.
Description:
Brick House Cigars Double Connecticut Churchill

  • Size: 7 1/4" x 50
  • Strength: Mild
Puff after puff you’ll be met with tame hints of sweet cedar, cream, and toast.

About Brick House Cigars

J.C. Newman launched Brick House; a true Cuban puro cigar made with the finest Havana tobaccos. To honor his family and heritage, J.C. modeled the Brick House label after his childhood home – the only brick house in their small, Hungarian village. Locals and visitors would gather at the house nightly to eat, drink, smoke and enjoy each other’s company. But with the Great Depression came the end of the Brick House. Over 80 years later, grandsons Eric and Bobby Newman relaunched Brick House using the most exquisite Nicaraguan tobaccos. Wrapped in a hearty Havana Subido™ leaf, every cigar features a rich blend of Nicaraguan tobaccos carefully hand-rolled by master artisans. Aged in the mountains of Nicaragua, every Brick House cigar is a melding of flawless construction, superb quality and master blend. An overnight sensation, the Brick House brand has become one of the most talked about cigars on the internet and a best seller nationwide. Awards include the Best Bargain Cigar and a place in the Top 25 Cigars by Cigar Aficionado in addition to numerous blog and website awards.
Tags: Brick House, Brick House Double Connecticut, Churchill, Connecticut Broadleaf, Connecticut Shade Grown, mild, nicaragua, Parejo

Name: Ashton Corona
Short description: Dominican tobaccos aged three to four years showcase a rich, golden Connecticut shade wrapper in an impressive manner your palate will savor.
Description:
Ashton Cigars Corona

  • Size: 5 1/2 x 44
  • Strength: Mild
An exceptional portrait of consistency, Ashton Classic delivers an attractive, mild creaminess engaged to faint notes of pepper.  Dominican tobaccos aged three to four years showcase a rich, golden Connecticut shade wrapper in an impressive manner your palate will savor.  Handcrafted in the Dominican Republic, the draw and construction coalesce to complement a luscious finish.  Ashton Classic remains an enduring sensation as one of the most versatile and approachable cigars in the market.

About Ashton Cigars

Ashton is one of the world’s premier luxury cigar brands. Handcrafted in the Dominican Republic, Ashton cigars are made to the highest quality standards using only the finest aged tobaccos. With an infinite commitment to quality, consistency and excellence, Ashton is celebrated worldwide for the very finest in premium cigars. Founded in 1985 by Robert Levin, Ashton Distributors, Inc. is family-owned and operated with headquarters in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. The Ashton tradition is rooted in the company’s unparalleled commitment to quality and consumer satisfaction. Handmade in the Dominican Republic in the legendary Tabacalera A. Fuente factory, Ashton cigars utilize only the finest, most exceptional, aged tobaccos. Every detail, from meticulous wrapper selection to the complex processes of aging and blending, receives the utmost accommodation in the manufacture of each cigar. Ashton has received numerous awards and accolades through the years and is a perennial “Top 5” brand in the U.S. market, as well as an international favorite with distribution in over 60 countries around the world. Following decades of success with the Fuente family, Ashton expanded its portfolio in the early 2000s by partnering with rising cigar-maker, Jose “Pepin” Garcia, to develop two new brands in Nicaragua. Renowned today as two of the fastest-growing cigar brands in the world, La Aroma de Cuba and San Cristobal continue to garner unrivaled critical acclaim and commendation. Partnership with the Garcia family exemplifies Ashton’s immense devotion to quality by collaborating with only the world’s most prolific cigar manufacturers. In addition to Ashton, La Aroma de Cuba and San Cristobal cigars, Ashton Distributors, Inc. is the proprietor of Savoy Humidors & Accessories, as well as the official U.S. distributor of Peterson Pipes & Pipe Tobacco. In 2004 Robert’s son, Sathya, joined the company on a full-time basis. Today, the Levin father and son team endeavors with passion to continue building Ashton’s reputation for creating the finest, most exquisite collection of premium cigars in the world.
Tags: Ashton, Connecticut Shade, corona, Dominican Republic, mild
Attribute 1 value(s): Single Cigar, 5 Cigars, Buncle of 25 Cigars

Following decades of success with the Fuente family, Ashton expanded its portfolio in the early 2000s by partnering with rising cigar-maker, Jose “Pepin” Garcia, to develop two new brands in Nicaragua. Renowned today as two of the fastest-growing cigar brands in the world, La Aroma de Cuba and San Cristobal continue to garner unrivaled critical acclaim and commendation. Partnership with the Garcia family exemplifies Ashton’s immense devotion to quality by collaborating with only the world’s most prolific cigar manufacturers. In addition to Ashton, La Aroma de Cuba and San Cristobal cigars, Ashton Distributors, Inc. is the proprietor of Savoy Humidors & Accessories, as well as the official U.S. distributor of Peterson Pipes & Pipe Tobacco. In 2004 Robert’s son, Sathya, joined the company on a full-time basis. Today, the Levin father and son team endeavors with passion to continue building Ashton’s reputation for creating the finest, most exquisite collection of premium cigars in the world.

Short description: Phenomenal earth and cedar notes endorse the bold, smooth finale.
Description:
La Aroma de Cuba El Jefe

  • Size: 7 x 58
  • Strength: Medium
An original Cuban brand from the late 1800s, La Aroma de Cuba has been reborn in the house of legendary cigar-maker, Jose "Pepin" Garcia, in Estelí, Nicaragua.  In the wake of its revival, La Aroma de Cuba is now a burgeoning enterprise synonymous with quality and value.  Precision blending of the finest, aged Nicaraguan tobaccos provides a consistent medium-bodied profile.  Connecticut Broadleaf wrappers rouse rich hints of brown sugar and cool spice.  Phenomenal earth and cedar notes endorse the bold, smooth finale.

Name: Brick House Maduro Toro
Short description: Brick House Maduro Toro cigars were conceived by the JC Newman Company to bring a darker and zestier version of its enormously popular predecessor to an eager audience of medium to full bodied smokers.
Description:
Brick House Cigars Maduro Toro

  • Size: 6 x 52
  • Strength: Medium
Brick House Maduro Toro cigars were conceived by the JC Newman Company to bring a darker and zestier version of its enormously popular predecessor to an eager audience of medium to full bodied smokers.

About Brick House Cigars

J.C. Newman launched Brick House; a true Cuban puro cigar made with the finest Havana tobaccos. To honor his family and heritage, J.C. modeled the Brick House label after his childhood home – the only brick house in their small, Hungarian village. Locals and visitors would gather at the house nightly to eat, drink, smoke and enjoy each other’s company. But with the Great Depression came the end of the Brick House. Over 80 years later, grandsons Eric and Bobby Newman relaunched Brick House using the most exquisite Nicaraguan tobaccos.  Wrapped in a hearty Havana Subido™ leaf, every cigar features a rich blend of Nicaraguan tobaccos carefully hand-rolled by master artisans. Aged in the mountains of Nicaragua, every Brick House cigar is a melding of flawless construction, superb quality and master blend.
An overnight sensation, the Brick House brand has become one of the most talked about cigars on the internet and a best seller nationwide. Awards include the Best Bargain Cigar and a place in the Top 25 Cigars by Cigar Aficionado in addition to numerous blog and website awards.

Name: Romeo Y Julieta Petit Royales
Short description: Habanos premiered the Romeo y Julieta Petit Royales, also called a Capricho, at the 19th annual Festival del Habanos.
Description:
Romeo Y Julieta Petit Royales Cuban Cigars

  • Size: 3 3/4 x 47
  • Strength: Medium
Habanos, S.A. presents the new Romeo y Julieta Petit Royales (47ring gauge x 95 mm length), a totally new vitola that is incorporated into the brand’s regular portfolio. This launch incorporates a new vitola into the Romeo y Julieta portfolio with a heavy ring gauge and shorter length, a format that is increasingly appreciated by fans. With a heavy ring gauge and short length, this is a Habano in line with the current trend in formats increasingly demanded by enthusiasts around the world. The new Petit Royales provide all the aroma, balance and complexity in nuances of Romeo y Julieta, the classic medium strength flavour Habano, in a short smoking time. Romeo y Julieta Petit Royales will be released in two presentations, a 25-unit box and a 3-tube case. All Romeo y Julieta brand Habanos are made Totalmente a Mano con Tripa Larga – Totally Handmade with Long Filler – with selected leaves from Vuelta Abajo, the best tobacco-growing region in the world, in Pinar del Río, Cuba. Romeo y Julieta is a historic brand of Habanos, founded in 1875. Winston Churchill was one of the brand’s most devoted smokers. Since his visit to Havana in 1946, his name has been used on some bands and the brand’s best-known vitola was named after him: Churchills of Romeo y Julieta. Habanos premiered the Romeo y Julieta Petit Royales, also called a Capricho, at the 19th annual Festival del Habanos.

About Romeo Y Julieta

Romeo Y Julieta’s balanced and aromatic blend of selected filler and binder leaves from the Vuelta Abajo zone make it the classic medium bodied Habano. Made using the Tripa Larga, Totalmente a Mano – long filler, totally made by hand – technique.

Name: Partagas Maduro No.1
Short description: The Partagás Maduro No. 1 also features a new and attractive product design, having a bofetón (the protective leaf of paper inside the box) and costero (the colored strip on the short sides of the box) in brown color, and a small band that accompanies the traditional ring of the brand, also in the same color, with the name of this new vitola.
Description:
Partagas Maduro No.1 Cuban Cigars

  • Size: 5 1/8 x 52
  • Strength: Full
Habanos s.a. presents the new Partagás Maduro No. 1 (52 ring gauge x 130 mm. length), a vitola that inaugurates within the brand a new Serie with dark shade maduro wrapper and which will be launched in a Semi Boîte Nature presentation of 25. Partagás Maduro No. 1, which will be supplied in the coming weeks to the outlets all over the world, offers the smoker all the flavour and intensity of Partagás, with a very special wrapper , selected from the best leaves harvested from the top levels of the “Shade Grown ” tobacco plant and which has developed, after an additional period of fermentation, a texture and intense color that are the ideal complements to the full flavour blend of Maduro No. 1. All Habanos of the Partagás brand are made “ Totalmente a Mano con Tripa Larga ” (Totally handmade with Long Filler) with selected leaves from the Vuelta Abajo zone – the best tobacco zone of the world – in the region of Pinar del Río , Cuba. The Partagás Maduro No. 1 also features a new and attractive product design, having a bofetón (the protective leaf of paper inside the box) and costero (the colored strip on the short sides of the box) in brown color, and a small band that accompanies the traditional ring of the brand, also in the same color, with the name of this new vitola.

About Partagas Cigars

A Partagas is immediately recognized  by its deep, earthy flavour. The character of its blend springs from a selection of filler and binder tobaccos grown in the Vuelta Abajo zone, chosen for their unmistakable richness of flavour and aroma.  Made using the Tripa Larga, Totalmente a Mano – long filler, totally hand made- technique.

Name: Alec Bradley Prensado Lost Art Robusto
Short description: The Honduran and Nicaraguan tobaccos come together to create leather, chocolate and spice, building to a long, lush finish
Description:
Alec Bradley Cigars Prensado Lost Art Robusto

  • Size: 5 x 50
  • Strength: Medium to Full Bodied
Nowadays, it seems production trumps artistry. In premium cigars, though, artisans still produce everything by hand- a process that hasn’t changed in hundreds of years. I get nostalgic about the days when a large majority of products were made with care, by hand. Prensado Lost Art pays homage to those times. Every Prensado Lost Art is traditionally rolled “entubado”- with each filler leaf rolled for perfect air flow. The cigars are semi-pressed and finished with a traditional triple cap.
Prensado means a lot to me and the Alec Bradley story. Rolled at Raices Cubanas (‘Cuban Roots’) factory, the Prensado was first created to pay homage to the Cuban traditions of cigar making rolling the filler ‘entuba-do,’ triple capping the head and box pressing the finished cigar. Blended with proprietary estate grown corojo from the Trojes region of Honduras, Prensado would eventually be named Cigar Aficionado “Cigar of the Year,” propelling Alec Bradley’s trajectory into cigar culture much quicker than I anticipated. – Alan Rubin The Alec Bradley Prensado , made at the superb Raices Cubanas factory in Danlí, Honduras, is as gorgeous a cigar as you’ll ever see, with a picture-perfect head and a stunning wrapper. But it is the flavor that makes it a classic smoke. The Honduran and Nicaraguan tobaccos come together to create leather, chocolate and spice, building to a long, lush finish
Tags: Alec Bradley, Dominican Republic, Honduras, Lost Art, Medium-Full, nicaragua, Parejo, Prensado, Robusto

Name: Cohiba Shorts Cuban Cigarillos
Short description: The Cohiba Shorts have the classic Cohiba blend of tobacco and the signature band.
Description:
Cohiba Shorts Cuban Cigarillos

  • Size: 3 1/4 x 26
  • Strength: Medium-Full
The Cohiba Shorts have the classic Cohiba blend of tobacco and the signature band.

About Cohiba Cigars

Cohiba is made from the “selection of the selection” of the best leaves of the tobacco plantations of San Juan y Martínez * (D.O.P) y San Luis * (D.O.P) areas in the Vuelta Abajo * (D.O.P) zone, the additional fermentation of the “ Seco ” and “ Ligero ” leaves provide unique aroma and flavour. Cohiba is the Habanos flagship.

Name: Trinidad Shorts Cuban Cigars
Description:
Trinidad Shorts Cuban Cigars

  • Size: 3 1/4 x 26
  • Strength: Mild-Medium Bodied
These petit smokes are machine made and filled with short filler leaves from the Vuelta Abajo region of Cuba. Surprisingly creamy in texture, with flavour notes of coffee, honey and a touch of spice.

About Trinidad Cigars

Trinidad, as a Habanos brand, dates back to 1969 but for many years, like Cohiba, it was made only for gifts to foreign diplomats. Not until 1998 was it released for general sale.  For several years Trinidad was made at El Laguito, the Cohiba factory,  where its uniquely fragrant and aromatic, medium flavoured blend of filler and binder leaves from the Vuelta Abajo zone was developed.  Made using the Tripa Larga, Totalmente a Mano - long filler, totally by hand - technique.

Name: Alec Bradley Prensado Lost Art Torpedo
Short description: The Honduran and Nicaraguan tobaccos come together to create leather, chocolate and spice, building to a long, lush finish
Description:
Alec Bradley Cigars Prensado Lost Art Torpedo

  • Size: 6 1/2 x 52
  • Strength: Medium to Full Bodied
Nowadays, it seems production trumps artistry. In premium cigars, though, artisans still produce everything by hand- a process that hasn’t changed in hundreds of years. I get nostalgic about the days when a large majority of products were made with care, by hand. Prensado Lost Art pays homage to those times. Every Prensado Lost Art is traditionally rolled “entubado”- with each filler leaf rolled for perfect air flow. The cigars are semi-pressed and finished with a traditional triple cap.
Prensado means a lot to me and the Alec Bradley story. Rolled at Raices Cubanas (‘Cuban Roots’) factory, the Prensado was first created to pay homage to the Cuban traditions of cigar making rolling the filler ‘entuba-do,’ triple capping the head and box pressing the finished cigar. Blended with proprietary estate grown corojo from the Trojes region of Honduras, Prensado would eventually be named Cigar Aficionado “Cigar of the Year,” propelling Alec Bradley’s trajectory into cigar culture much quicker than I anticipated. – Alan Rubin The Alec Bradley Prensado , made at the superb Raices Cubanas factory in Danlí, Honduras, is as gorgeous a cigar as you’ll ever see, with a picture-perfect head and a stunning wrapper. But it is the flavor that makes it a classic smoke. The Honduran and Nicaraguan tobaccos come together to create leather, chocolate and spice, building to a long, lush finish

Attribute 1 value(s): Single Cigar, 5 Cigars, Box of 20 Cigars

Name: Padron 1964 Anniversary No.4 Natural
Short description: The Padrón 1964 Anniversary Series is consistently ranked by industry experts as one of the top brands in the world.
Description:
Padron Cigars 1964 Anniversary No.4 Natural

  • Size: 6 1/2 x 60
  • Strength: Medium-Bodied
The Padrón 1964 Anniversary Series line was introduced in 1994 to commemorate our company’s 30th anniversary. This line consists of eleven sizes that are all available in sun-grown natural and maduro wrappers. All tobacco used in this limited production series is aged for four years, creating a smooth and complex flavor. In honor of the age-old Cuban tradition of box-pressing cigars, the 1964 Anniversary line was introduced as a box-pressed series. For the protection of our customers we have introduced measures to safeguard against counterfeiting with a specially designed double band featuring an individually numbered guarantee label. The Padrón 1964 Anniversary Series is consistently ranked by industry experts as one of the top brands in the world.

About Padron Cigars

All tobacco used in the manufacture of this cigar is sun-grown and aged for a minimum of 2 1/2 years. Offering exceptional quality and value, this cigar is available in natural or maduro wrapper. Founded in 1964 and evolving throughout our history, the Padrón Series today consists of fifteen medium to full-bodied, long-filler cigars ranging from Panatelas to the large “A” size Magnum

Name: AJ Fernandez New World Puro Especial Robusto
Short description: Medium bodied, perfectly balanced, with notes of nuts and a sweet finish, AJ and his father Ismael have yet again redefined the classic taste of a Nicaraguan Puro!
Description:
AJ Fernandez Cigars New World Puro Especial Robusto

  • Size: 5 1/2 x 52
  • Strength: Medium
Medium bodied, perfectly balanced, with notes of nuts and a sweet finish, AJ and his father Ismael have yet again redefined the classic taste of a Nicaraguan Puro! This incredible blend has been in the works for a few years and AJ has used the best tobacco from his various select farms in Esteli, Nicaragua. Aged to perfection!

About AJ Fernandez Cigars

AJ’s first collaboration with his Father Ismael is a nod to the discovery of tobacco by Christopher Columbus and its introduction to the rest of the world in 1492. Raised in Cuba and steeped in the rich tradition of Fernandez cigar legacy, AJ Fernandez produces unparalleled premium cigars in Esteli, Nicaragua. Ensuring superior quality, the day-to-day operations at Tabacalera AJ Fernandez are managed under the watchful eye of AJ himself. Through a fusion of inherited technique and learned patience, Fernandez’ long filler tobaccos are grown from prized seeds which are proprietary only to the Fernandez family. Perhaps the most essential quality of the AJ Fernandez line of cigars is the perspective and motivation of AJ, as well as the history of the Fernandez family.

Name: La Galera Chaveta Habano Robusto
Description:
La Galera Chaveta Habano Robusto

  • Size: 5 x 50
  • Strength: Medium
The Habano is a classic wrapper on a staple cigar for a classic company. An authentic Dominican cigar elaborated with the hands of the best rollers of Tabacalera Palma. Blended around an outstandingly flavorful Ecuadorian Habano wrapper, the Dominican grown Corojo binder and filler made up of Piloto Cubano, Criollo 98, and Pelo de Oro, create medium-to-full, attractively consistent and aromatic smoke that envies no other.
"The Birth of La Galera Cigars" : On a warm and sunny day in Tamboril, considered to many as the cigar capital of the world, lying in the outskirts of Santiago, Dominican Republic, lies Jose Arnaldo Blanco, known to all as “Jochy”, puffing calmly on cigar. A man who has worked with tobacco for as long as he can recall and his unconditional love and passion for it is obvious to all. Through hard work and determination, he’s grown and processed tobacco to perfection throughout his tenure as a manufacturer and grower for the last few decades, and his factory Tabacalera Palma has been the home for outstanding cigars that have gained the love and appreciation of smokers all over the world. As he calmly takes a slow draw from his caramel-like colored wrapped cigar, he realizes that everything is exactly the way he wants it. Staring fondly at a painting across his desk, he appreciates rollers in the factory nearly 80 years ago and a smile starts to reflect. In his mind, this is the perfect time to bring to life exactly what he’s looking at. It’s where it all begins, La Galera is where cigars are produced in a factory; it’s where the magic happens. This is when La Galera cigars is born. Bundles of 10 cigars
Tags: Chaveta, Dominican Republic, Habano, La Galera, Medium, Robusto
Attribute 8 value(s): Dominican Piloto Cubano| Criollo 98| Pelo de Oro

Name: La Galera Chaveta Maduro Robusto
Short description: Ultimately, a balanced and pleasant smoke conditioned for the consistent performance the smoker deserves.
Description:
La Galera Cigars Chaveta Maduro Robusto

  • Size: 5 x 50
  • Strength: Medium
Our reserves largely consist of tobacco grown in our farms; however, significant portions of our holdings have come from scouring the world’s best farms to secure collections flushed with potential to mature into something special. In doing so, we’re able to focus solely on crafting blends that deliver the most exceptional quality and experience like La Galera Maduro. La Galera’s latest addition is comprised of a rich San Andrés wrapper with delicious Piloto Cubano and Crillo 98 tobacco from Tabacalera Palma’s Jacagua and Gurabo farms. Ultimately, a balanced and pleasant smoke conditioned for the consistent performance the smoker deserves.
